channel.title: Comments on: Pipers Brown Butter Short Bread – Daring Bakers Challenge November 2012

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: I loved the taste of these biscuits, they would definitely make a very nice gift at Christmas time!!! Hint, hint!!!
item.content:encoded: I loved the taste of these biscuits, they would definitely make a very nice gift at Christmas time!!! Hint, hint!!!

item.title: By: Nic@diningwithastud
item.dc:creator: Nic@diningwithastud
item.description: Gorgeous colour :) almost like gingerbread. I love the different shapes too.
item.content:encoded: Gorgeous colour ðŸ™‚ almost like gingerbread. I love the different shapes too.

item.title: By: katie Apple&Spice
item.dc:creator: katie Apple&Spice
item.description: They look delicious and I like how they still worked when rolled into balls. I nearly made these cookies too, so am pleased to see how they turned out
item.content:encoded: They look delicious and I like how they still worked when rolled into balls. I nearly made these cookies too, so am pleased to see how they turned out
